overview: In the distasteful dating realm of lame pickup lines, one-night-stands-gone-bad, meaningless booty calls, maniacal nymphomaniacs, and creepy men--grounded young singles, Sarah (Katie Morgan) and Eric, search for something more. Despite their friends protests that Internet dating is an act of desperation, they decide to give it a shot. But will Sarah and Eric find that online dating is just as bad as the more traditional ways of meeting other singles? Or, will they finally find the true love for which they have been searching?
tagline: Love is only a click away
title: Perfect Match
